016package org.lifstools.jmzqc;
017
018import com.networknt.schema.ValidationMessage;
019import java.io.BufferedWriter;
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.StringWriter;
023import java.nio.file.Files;
024import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
025import java.time.Instant;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.HashSet;
028import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
029import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.Properties;
035import java.util.stream.Collectors;
036import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
037import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser;
038import org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter;
039import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
040import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
041import org.apache.commons.cli.PosixParser;
042
043/**
044 * Create a new command line parser for parsing of lipid names.
045 *
046 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
047 * @author Nils Hoffmann
048 *
049 */
050public class CmdLineParser {
051
052    private static String getAppInfo() throws IOException {
053        Properties p = new Properties();
054        p.load(CmdLineParser.class.getResourceAsStream(
055                "/application.properties"));
056        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
057        String buildDate = p.getProperty("app.build.date", "no build date");
058        if (!"no build date".equals(buildDate)) {
059            Instant instant = Instant.ofEpochMilli(Long.parseLong(buildDate));
060            buildDate = instant.toString();
061        }
062        /*
063         *Property keys are in src/main/resources/application.properties
064         */
065        sb.append("Running ").
066                append(p.getProperty("app.name", "undefined app")).
067                append("\n\r").
068                append(" version: '").
069                append(p.getProperty("app.version", "unknown version")).
070                append("'").
071                append("\n\r").
072                append(" build-date: '").
073                append(buildDate).
074                append("'").
075                append("\n\r").
076                append(" scm-location: '").
077                append(p.getProperty("scm.location", "no scm location")).
078                append("'").
079                append("\n\r").
080                append(" commit: '").
081                append(p.getProperty("scm.commit.id", "no commit id")).
082                append("'").
083                append("\n\r").
084                append(" branch: '").
085                append(p.getProperty("scm.branch", "no branch")).
086                append("'").
087                append("\n\r");
088        return sb.toString();
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * <p>
093     * Runs the command line validation for jmzqc.</p>
094     *
095     * Run with the {@code -h} or {@code --help} option to see more options.
096     *
097     * @param args an array of {@link java.lang.String} lipid names.
098     * @throws java.lang.Exception if any unexpected errors occur.
099     */
100    @SuppressWarnings("static-access")
101    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
102        CommandLineParser parser = new PosixParser();
103        Options options = new Options();
104        String helpOpt = addHelpOption(options);
105        String versionOpt = addVersionOption(options);
106        String inputFileOpt = addFileInputOption(options);
107        String outputToFileOpt = addOutputToFileOption(options);
108
109        CommandLine line = parser.parse(options, args);
110        if (line.getOptions().length == 0 || line.hasOption(helpOpt)) {
111            HelpFormatter formatter = new HelpFormatter();
112            formatter.printHelp("jmzqc", options);
113        } else if (line.hasOption(versionOpt)) {
114            System.out.println(getAppInfo());
115        } else {
116            boolean toFile = false;
117            String outputFile = "jmzqc-out.tsv";
118            if (line.hasOption(outputToFileOpt)) {
119                toFile = true;
120                outputFile = line.getOptionValue(outputToFileOpt);
121            }
122            Optional<File> inputFile = Optional.empty();
123            if (line.hasOption(inputFileOpt)) {
124                inputFile = Optional.of(new File(line.getOptionValue(inputFileOpt)));
125            }
126            List<ValidationMessage> results = Collections.emptyList();
127            if (inputFile.isPresent()) {
128                try {
129                    results = validate(inputFile.get());
130                } catch (NoSuchFileException ex) {
131                    System.err.println("File " + inputFile.get() + " does not exist!");
132                    System.exit(1);
133                }
134            }
135            if (results.isEmpty()) {
136                System.out.println("Validation successful!");
137                System.exit(0);
138            }
139            if (toFile) {
140                System.out.println("Saving output to '" + outputFile + "'.");
141                boolean successful = writeToFile(new File(outputFile), results);
142                System.exit(1);
143            } else {
144                System.out.println("Echoing output to stderr.");
145                boolean successful = writeToStdOut(results);
146                System.exit(1);
147            }
148        }
149    }
150
151    private static boolean writeToStdOut(List<ValidationMessage> results) {
152
153        try ( StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) {
154            try ( BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(sw)) {
155                writeToWriter(bw, results);
156            }
157            sw.flush();
158            sw.close();
159            System.err.println(sw.toString());
160            return true;
161        } catch (IOException ex) {
162            System.err.println("Caught exception while trying to write validation results string!");
163            ex.printStackTrace(System.err);
164            return false;
165        }
166    }
167
168    private static boolean writeToFile(File f, List<ValidationMessage> results) {
169
170        try ( BufferedWriter bw = Files.newBufferedWriter(f.toPath())) {
171            writeToWriter(bw, results);
172            return true;
173        } catch (IOException ex) {
174            System.err.println("Caught exception while trying to write validation results to file " + f);
175            ex.printStackTrace(System.err);
176            return false;
177        }
178    }
179
180    private static String toTable(List<ValidationMessage> results) {
181        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
182        HashSet<String> keys = new LinkedHashSet<>();
183        List<Map<String, String>> entries = results.stream().map((t) -> {
184            Map<String, String> m = new LinkedHashMap<>();
185            m.put("Code", t.getCode());
186            m.put("Message", t.getMessage());
187            m.put("Path", t.getPath());
188            m.put("SchemaPath", t.getSchemaPath());
189            m.put("Type", t.getType());
190            m.put("MessageString", t.toString());
191            keys.addAll(m.keySet());
192            return m;
193        }).toList();
194        sb.append(keys.stream().collect(Collectors.joining("\t"))).append("\n");
195        for (Map<String, String> m : entries) {
196            List<String> l = new LinkedList();
197            for (String key : keys) {
198                l.add(m.getOrDefault(key, ""));
199            }
200            sb.append(l.stream().collect(Collectors.joining("\t"))).append("\n");
201        }
202        return sb.toString();
203    }
204
205    private static void writeToWriter(BufferedWriter bw, List<ValidationMessage> results) {
206        try {
207            bw.write(toTable(results));
208            bw.newLine();
209        } catch (IOException ex) {
210            System.err.println("Caught exception while trying to write validation results to buffered writer.");
211            ex.printStackTrace(System.err);
212        }
213    }
214
215    private static List<ValidationMessage> validate(File inputFile) throws IOException {
216        return new LinkedList<>(Converter.validate(inputFile));
217    }
218
219    protected static String addFileInputOption(Options options) {
220        String fileOpt = "file";
221        options.addOption("f", fileOpt, true, "Input a file name to read from for lipid name for parsing. Each lipid name must be on a separate line.");
222        return fileOpt;
223    }
224
225    protected static String addVersionOption(Options options) {
226        String versionOpt = "version";
227        options.addOption("v", versionOpt, false, "Print version information.");
228        return versionOpt;
229    }
230
231    protected static String addHelpOption(Options options) {
232        String helpOpt = "help";
233        options.addOption("h", helpOpt, false, "Print help message.");
234        return helpOpt;
235    }
236
237    protected static String addOutputToFileOption(Options options) {
238        String outputToFileOpt = "outputFile";
239        options.addOption("o", outputToFileOpt, true, "Write output to provided file in tsv format instead of to std out.");
240        return outputToFileOpt;
241    }
242
243}
